Post.title: JS()
Post.content:
• string
  • nubmer
  • boolean
  • undefined
  • object (null)
  • symbol (ES6+)

Truthy&Falsy

  • Boolean(NaN) === false
  • Boolean([]) === true
  • Boolean({}) === true



NaN

a-zA-Z$_0-9

Strict

IIFE

API

this

  • foo()strictthisstrictthisundefined
  • obj1.foo()thisobj1
  • foo.call(obj2)thisobj2
  • new foo()this

LHS var a
RHS a = 2

  1. eval

  2. with

eval with eval with

b doSomethingElse(..) doSomething(..)

IIFE

UMD

def def IIFE def window global

  • With

  • let

  • const

Post.raw:
--- title: CSS date: 2014-05-15 16:59:12 tags: - css categories: - --- > last update: 2018-01-10 ## fastclick ```css label > * { pointer-events: none; } ``` ## ```css ::selection {color:#09c;} ``` ## ```css font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'; ``` ## div ```html
``` ```css div { height: 100px; display: table-cell; vertical-align: middle; } ``` ## CSS ```html
``` ```css div { height: 0; width: 0; margin-bottom: 1em; } ``` ```css border-left: 5px solid transparent; border-right: 5px solid transparent; border-bottom: 5px solid #09c; ``` +*0.866=8.66 ```css border-bottom: 9px solid #09c; ``` ## box-shadow [jsFiddle](http://jsfiddle.net/66beta/ad4HG/) {% jsfiddle ad4HG html,css,result %} ## ios ```css * { -webkit-appearance: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); } ```

Post.title: Docker
Post._content:
> Nice to meet U, I'm Docker

Dockervirtualbox+katematicdocker-tools

dockernodejsdocker
<!-- more -->

## 

docker[docker-ce-desktop-mac](https://store.docker.com/editions/community/docker-ce-desktop-mac)
> Homebrewdocker-cli 

### 

 Docker `Preferences - Daemon - Registry mirrors` DaoCloud `http://ebccc999.m.daocloud.io`DaoCloudgoogle`Apply & Restart`

`docker info` 

## 

nginx `docker container run --publish 80:80 nginx` Nginx

```bash
$ docker container run --publish 80:80 nginx
Unable to find image 'nginx:latest' locally
latest: Pulling from library/nginx
e7bb522d92ff: Pull complete
6edc05228666: Pull complete
cd866a17e81f: Pull complete
Digest: sha256:8374bf37a36a58cbbc9a3b8c6f5b838b750a610986d90f5b2437411b38e5e93e
Status: Downloaded newer image for nginx:latest
```

 [http://localhost](http://localhost) Nginx 

 `--detach` `docker container run --publish 80:80 --detach nginx`ID_0077235b8a9d*************************************_

### 

`docker container ls`

```bash
CONTAINER ID        IMAGE               COMMAND                  CREATED              STATUS              PORTS                NAMES
0077235b8a9d        nginx               "nginx -g 'daemon ..."   About a minute ago   Up About a minute   0.0.0.0:80->80/tcp   inspiring_saha
```

### 

`docker container stop 0077235b8a9d`

### 

`docker container ls -a`

```bash
CONTAINER ID        IMAGE               COMMAND                  CREATED             STATUS                     PORTS                NAMES
0077235b8a9d        nginx               "nginx -g 'daemon ..."   4 minutes ago       Up 4 minutes               0.0.0.0:80->80/tcp   inspiring_saha
c4a05b8e8200        nginx               "nginx -g 'daemon ..."   8 minutes ago       Exited (0) 4 minutes ago                        amazing_noyce
```

 _NAMES_  `docker container run --publish 80:80 --detach --name nginx4node nginx` 

### 

`docker container start 0077235b8a9d`

### 

`docker container logs nginx4node`


### 

`docker container rm 0077235b8a9d`

## 

`docker container run --publish 8080:80 --detach nginx:*.* --name nginx4node`

+ `8080:80`
+ `nginx:*.*`Nginx`nginx:latest`

##  Katematic

GUI CLIB Katematic 

![katematic](/public/katematic.png)

Post.title: VPS
Post._content:
VPSDigitalOceanGoogle
<!-- more -->

## OSUbuntu

CentOSUbuntu

## root

SSH

```bash
sudo passwd root
```

## 

up-to-date

```bash
sudo apt-get update
```

## Shadowsocks

[Shadowsocks on Github](https://github.com/clowwindy/shadowsocks)
Across the Great Firewall, we can reach every corner in the world.


## LAMP

DigitalOcean

```bash
sudo apt-get install lamp-server^
```

mod_rewrite

```bash
sudo a2enmod rewrite
```

Mcrypt

```bash
sudo apt-get install php5-mcrypt
```

apache

```bash
sudo service apache2 restart
```

## apache

1. 

    ```bash
    sudo cp /etc/apache2/sites-available/000-default.conf /etc/apache2/sites-available/example.com.conf
    ```

1. 

```bash
sudo vi /etc/apache2/sites-available/example.com.conf
```



```bash
<VirtualHost *:80>
    ServerAdmin webmaster@localhost
    ServerName example.com
    ServerAlias www.example.com
    DocumentRoot /var/www/html/example
    ErrorLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/error.log
    CustomLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/access.log combined
</VirtualHost>
```



```bash
sudo a2ensite example.com.conf
```

apache

```bash
sudo service apache2 restart
```

## 

000-default.conf

```bash
sudo vi /etc/apache2/sites-available/000-default.conf
```

Post.title: jQuery MobileJS
Post._content: jQuery MobileCSSJSjs jQurey Mobile `"It's important to note that if you are linking from a mobile page that was loaded via Ajax to a page that contains multiple internal pages, you need to add a rel="external" or data-ajax="false" to the link. This tells the framework to do a full page reload to clear out the Ajax hash in the URL. This is critical because Ajax pages use the hash (#) to track the Ajax history, while multiple internal pages use the hash to indicate internal pages so there will be conflicts in the hash between these two modes."` `Multi-page link`
Post.raw: --- title: 'jQuery MobileJS' date: 2014-06-24 16:35:42 tags: - jQuery Mobile - js categories: - --- jQuery MobileCSSJSjs jQurey Mobile `"It's important to note that if you are linking from a mobile page that was loaded via Ajax to a page that contains multiple internal pages, you need to add a rel="external" or data-ajax="false" to the link. This tells the framework to do a full page reload to clear out the Ajax hash in the URL. This is critical because Ajax pages use the hash (#) to track the Ajax history, while multiple internal pages use the hash to indicate internal pages so there will be conflicts in the hash between these two modes."` `Multi-page link`
Post.content:
jQuery MobileCSSJSjs

jQurey Mobile
"It's important to note that if you are linking from a mobile page that was loaded via Ajax to a page that contains multiple internal pages, you need to add a rel="external" or data-ajax="false" to the link. This tells the framework to do a full page reload to clear out the Ajax hash in the URL. This is critical because Ajax pages use the hash (#) to track the Ajax history, while multiple internal pages use the hash to indicate internal pages so there will be conflicts in the hash between these two modes."

<a href="multipage.html" rel="external">Multi-page link</a>
Post.more:
jQurey Mobile
"It's important to note that if you are linking from a mobile page that was loaded via Ajax to a page that contains multiple internal pages, you need to add a rel="external" or data-ajax="false" to the link. This tells the framework to do a full page reload to clear out the Ajax hash in the URL. This is critical because Ajax pages use the hash (#) to track the Ajax history, while multiple internal pages use the hash to indicate internal pages so there will be conflicts in the hash between these two modes."

<a href="multipage.html" rel="external">Multi-page link</a>
